languages.text: "Когда как". {n}Энрих ухмыляется, но тут же мрачнеет.{/n} "Гильдии Инфернус запрещено брать в руки оружие. На нашем клане клеймо потомков мятежников. Когда-то станция, откуда мы родом, подняла бунт против предшественника Леди Теодоры. Изменники были убиты, прочие обитатели станции брошены в пустоте умирать без кислорода и воды. Выжила лишь тысяча покаявшихся, отобранная Вольным Торговцем и взятая на борт".

"Depends on who's wielding it," {n}Einrich says with a chuckle, but then his expression darkens.{/n} "The Infernus Guild is banned from taking up arms. Our clan is branded because our ancestors were rebels. The station where we originally hail from once rose against Lady Theodora's predecessor. The traitors were killed, and the rest of the station was left stranded in the void to die without air or water. Out of those who repented, the Rogue Trader selected a thousand who were allowed on board."
languages.original_text: "Когда как". {n}Энрих ухмыляется, но тут же мрачнеет.{/n} "Гильдии Инфернус запрещено брать в руки оружие. На нашем клане клеймо потомков мятежников. Когда-то станция, откуда мы родом, подняла бунт против предшественника Леди Теодоры. Изменники были убиты, прочие обитатели станции брошены в пустоте умирать без кислорода и воды. Выжила лишь тысяча покаявшихся, отобранная Вольным Торговцем и взятая на борт".

languages.text: « Tout dépend de la personne qui la manie, » {n}rétorque Einrich en ricanant, mais très vite, son expression s'assombrit.{/n} « La guilde infernus a l'interdiction formelle de prendre les armes, et ce, parce que nos ancêtres ont eu l'audace de se rebeller. Il y a bien longtemps, notre station d'origine s'est dressée contre le prédécesseur de dame Théodora. Les traîtres ont été exécutés. Parmi tous ceux qui ont cherché à se repentir, seul un millier a été accepté sur le vaisseau du libre-marchand. Tous les autres ont été abandonnés à leur sort dans le vide, privés d'eau et même d'air. »
languages.original_text: "Depends on who's wielding it," {n}Einrich says with a chuckle, but then his expression darkens.{/n} "The Infernus Guild is banned from taking up arms. Our clan is branded because our ancestors were rebels. The station where we originally hail from once rose against Lady Theodora's predecessor. The traitors were killed, and the rest of the station was left stranded in the void to die without air or water. Out of those who repented, the Rogue Trader selected a thousand who were allowed on board."

traits.locale_text: « Tout dépend de la personne qui la manie, » {n}rétorque Einrich en ricanant, mais très vite, son expression s'assombrit.{/n} « La guilde infernus a l'interdiction formelle de prendre les armes, et ce, parce que nos ancêtres ont eu l'audace de se rebeller. Il y a bien longtemps, notre station d'origine s'est dressée contre le prédécesseur de dame Théodora. Les traîtres ont été exécutés. Parmi tous ceux qui ont cherché à se repentir, seul un millier a été accepté sur le vaisseau du libre-marchand. Tous les autres ont été abandonnés à leur sort dans le vide, privés d'eau et même d'air. »

languages.text: «Depende de quién la use», {n}responde Einrich con una risita, pero su expresión se ensombrece.{/n} «El gremio de infernus tiene prohibido usar armas. Nuestro clan está marcado porque nuestros ancestros se rebelaron. La estación de la que provenimos originalmente se alzó contra el predecesor de lady Theodora. Ejecutaron a los traidores y dejaron al resto de la estación abandonada en el vacío a su suerte, sin comida ni agua. El Comerciante Independiente seleccionó a un millar de entre los que se arrepintieron para que subieran a bordo».
languages.original_text: "Depends on who's wielding it," {n}Einrich says with a chuckle, but then his expression darkens.{/n} "The Infernus Guild is banned from taking up arms. Our clan is branded because our ancestors were rebels. The station where we originally hail from once rose against Lady Theodora's predecessor. The traitors were killed, and the rest of the station was left stranded in the void to die without air or water. Out of those who repented, the Rogue Trader selected a thousand who were allowed on board."

Nuestro clan está marcado porque nuestros ancestros se rebelaron. La estación de la que provenimos originalmente se alzó contra el predecesor de lady Theodora. Ejecutaron a los traidores y dejaron al resto de la estación abandonada en el vacío a su suerte, sin comida ni agua. El Comerciante Independiente seleccionó a un millar de entre los que se arrepintieron para que subieran a bordo».

languages.text: “这得取决于挥舞火把的人是谁。”{n}艾因里奇笑了起来，但随后表情变得黯淡下来。{/n}“控火行会的人禁止携带武器。我们的氏族被打上了耻辱的烙印，因为我们的祖先是背叛者。我们原本出身的星站曾反对过西奥多拉夫人前任行商浪人的统治。所有叛徒都被当场格杀，剩下的人被丢到了虚空之中，活活憋死。至于那些悔过的人们，当时的行商浪人挑选了一千名成员，允许他们上船服役。”
languages.original_text: "Depends on who's wielding it," {n}Einrich says with a chuckle, but then his expression darkens.{/n} "The Infernus Guild is banned from taking up arms. Our clan is branded because our ancestors were rebels. The station where we originally hail from once rose against Lady Theodora's predecessor. The traitors were killed, and the rest of the station was left stranded in the void to die without air or water. Out of those who repented, the Rogue Trader selected a thousand who were allowed on board."

traits.locale_text: “这得取决于挥舞火把的人是谁。”{n}艾因里奇笑了起来，但随后表情变得黯淡下来。{/n}“控火行会的人禁止携带武器。我们的氏族被打上了耻辱的烙印，因为我们的祖先是背叛者。我们原本出身的星站曾反对过西奥多拉夫人前任行商浪人的统治。所有叛徒都被当场格杀，剩下的人被丢到了虚空之中，活活憋死。至于那些悔过的人们，当时的行商浪人挑选了一千名成员，允许他们上船服役。”

languages.text: 「誰が使うかによる」{n}アインリッヒは笑った。だがすぐに彼の表情は暗くなった。{/n}「インフェルヌス・ギルドは武器を持つことを禁じられている。私たちの一族は、祖先が反逆者だったという烙印を押されてる。私たちのステーションは一度シオドーラ様の前任者に対して反逆行為を起こしました。裏切り者たちは殺され、ステーションは空気も水もない虚空に取り残されて人々は死んだ。悔い改めた者たちの中から、ローグトレーダーが1000人を選び、乗船を許可したのさ」
languages.original_text: "Depends on who's wielding it," {n}Einrich says with a chuckle, but then his expression darkens.{/n} "The Infernus Guild is banned from taking up arms. Our clan is branded because our ancestors were rebels. The station where we originally hail from once rose against Lady Theodora's predecessor. The traitors were killed, and the rest of the station was left stranded in the void to die without air or water. Out of those who repented, the Rogue Trader selected a thousand who were allowed on board."

traits.locale_text: 「誰が使うかによる」{n}アインリッヒは笑った。だがすぐに彼の表情は暗くなった。{/n}「インフェルヌス・ギルドは武器を持つことを禁じられている。私たちの一族は、祖先が反逆者だったという烙印を押されてる。私たちのステーションは一度シオドーラ様の前任者に対して反逆行為を起こしました。裏切り者たちは殺され、ステーションは空気も水もない虚空に取り残されて人々は死んだ。悔い改めた者たちの中から、ローグトレーダーが1000人を選び、乗船を許可したのさ」

languages.text: "Das kommt darauf an, wer sie führt"{n}, sagt Einrich lachend, doch dann verdüstert sich seine Miene.{/n} "Der Infernus-Gilde ist es verboten, Waffen zu führen. Unser Clan wurde mit dem Mal der Schande gebrandmarkt, weil unsere Ahnen Rebellen waren. Die Station, von der wir ursprünglich stammen, hat sich eins gegen Lady Theodoras Vorgänger aufgelehnt. Die Verräter wurden getötet, der Rest der Station wurde ohne Luft oder Wasser in der Leere ausgesetzt. Von denen, die Buße getan haben, hat der Freihändler eintausend ausgewählt, die an Bord gelassen wurden."
languages.original_text: "Depends on who's wielding it," {n}Einrich says with a chuckle, but then his expression darkens.{/n} "The Infernus Guild is banned from taking up arms. Our clan is branded because our ancestors were rebels. The station where we originally hail from once rose against Lady Theodora's predecessor. The traitors were killed, and the rest of the station was left stranded in the void to die without air or water. Out of those who repented, the Rogue Trader selected a thousand who were allowed on board."

traits.locale_text: "Das kommt darauf an, wer sie führt"{n}, sagt Einrich lachelnd, doch dann verdüstert sich seine Miene.{/n} "Der Infernus-Gilde ist es verboten, Waffen zu führen. Unser Clan wurde mit dem Mal der Schande gebrandmarkt, weil unsere Ahnen Rebellen waren. Die Station, von der wir ursprünglich stammen, hat sich eins gegen Lady Theodoras Vorgänger aufgelehnt. Die Verräter wurden getötet, der Rest der Stadtion wurde ohne Luft oder Wasser in der Leere ausgesetzt. Von denen, die Buße getan haben, hat der Freihändler eintausend ausgewählt, die an Bord gelassen wurden."

languages.text: "Kimin kullandığına bağlı." {n}Einrich, gülümseyerek konuşsa da sonrasında yüz ifadesi ciddileşiyor.{/n} "İtfa Loncası'nın silahlanması yasaklanmıştır. Klanımız, atalarımızın gerçekleştirdiği isyan nedeniyle damgalanmıştır. Kökenimiz olan istasyon, zamanında Leydi Theodora'nın selefine başkaldırmıştır. Hainler öldürülmüş olup istasyonun geri kalanı da hava ve su olmadan uçsuzda sürüklenerek ölmeye terk edilmiştir. Hür Tacir, tövbe edenler arasından bin kişi seçip gemisine almıştır."
languages.original_text: "Depends on who's wielding it," {n}Einrich says with a chuckle, but then his expression darkens.{/n} "The Infernus Guild is banned from taking up arms. Our clan is branded because our ancestors were rebels. The station where we originally hail from once rose against Lady Theodora's predecessor. The traitors were killed, and the rest of the station was left stranded in the void to die without air or water. Out of those who repented, the Rogue Trader selected a thousand who were allowed on board."
